name: Negroni
ingredients:
• 1 Oz Gin
• 1 Oz Campari
• 1 Oz Red Sweet Vermouth
• 1 Dash Ingredient with rediculously long name that doesn't fit one line
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass and stir well. Strain into old fashioned glass with ice and add orange slice as a garnish.

name: White Russian
ingredients:
• 1 Oz Vodka
• 1 Oz Kahlúa
• 1 Oz Half-and-half cream
instructions: Add vodka and Kahlúa into final glass and stir well. Float cream on top.
